# Setup
```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(magrittr)
```

# Input
```{r input}
test <- read_csv(here::here("titanic", "data", "test.csv"))
train <- read_csv(here::here("titanic", "data", "train.csv")) %>%
  set_colnames(str_to_lower(colnames(.)))
```
# Everyone Dies
```{r alldead}
test$Survived <- 0
write_csv(test, here::here("titanic", "submissions", "1_alldead.csv"))
```
